about.description: During my experience, I've honed skills in web scraping, data analysis, machine learning, and predictive modeling. I've also mastered PySpark, Snowflake, AWS, and automation, alongside expertise in Jira Zephyr API integration, Azure AI Studio, and OpenAI. These skills empower me to effectively tackle complex data challenges.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: During my 10-month tenure as a Data Science Intern at Globussoft Technologies, I honed my expertise in web scraping, data analysis, machine learning, and predictive modeling. My contributions to various projects significantly improved data-driven decision-making processes, enabling more informed choices. This hands-on experience solidified my proficiency in Python, empowering me to tackle complex data challenges effectively.

experience.title: Data Engineer Intern
experience.description: As a Data Engineer Intern at Techment Technology, I refined skills in PySpark, Snowflake, AWS, enhancing data-driven decision-making. My contributions improved project outcomes, fostering informed choices. This experience fortified Python proficiency, empowering me to adeptly address intricate data challenges.

experience.title: Python Developer
experience.description: At PeopleFlow, as a full-time employee, I honed skills in automation, Jira Zephyr API integration, Azure AI Studio, and OpenAI strengthening data-driven decision-making. My contributions enhanced project outcomes, promoting informed choices. This experience bolstered Python expertise, enabling me to effectively tackle complex data challenges.
